question: The PM SVANidhi scheme that has crossed a loan sanction mark of 1 lakh, has been launched by which Ministry?
option3: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
Under the Pradhan Mantri Street Vendors Atma Nirbhar Nidhi (SVANidhi) Scheme which was launched by Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs, the number of loans sanctioned by Financial Institutions has crossed 1 lakh mark. 
The scheme facilitates sanction of collateral free working capital loans up to Rs.10,000 of 1-year term to street vendors. The scheme has been launched as a part of the Atma Nirbhar Bharat Financial Assistance Package for COVID 19.
